document_data.name: Blind
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blind''' was an ancient [[beholder]] who lived in [[Skullport]] beneath [[Waterdeep]] in the 15th century DR.
document_data.Personality:
As his name implied, he was blind, and weakened from centuries living in Skullport.  He claimed to be the [[Kirukeskai|Eye]], the infamous [[Xanathar (title)|Xanathar]] from Skullport's past but most considered the claim unlikely since the Eye was known to have died in a fight with his former minion, the [[lich]] known as [[Avaereene]]. 

The Blind had an encyclopedic knowledge of Skullport's history.
document_data.Relationships: The Blind was too weak to command his own gang but, because he was allied with no gang and vastly knowledgeable about Skullport, the gangs trusted him as an arbitrator of disputes. He was often called upon to serve as a consultant and intermediary between Skullport's gang factions. He sat as adjudicator at many meetings that finalized gang boundaries. Although he was unable to command the respect of gangs or personally enforce rulings, his judgments were respected and maintained.
document_data.History: The Blind claimed that while his fight with Avaereene left him severely wounded, his death was a ruse to deceive his rival. As of [[1479 DR]], he was looking for the ''[[Crown of Horns]]'', a relic rumored to be in the [[Nhyris D'Hothek|Murkstalker]]'s possession. He believed the artifact would restore his power and help him get revenge on Avaereene.
